name: Galactic Rush (MrQuazar)
description:
Galactic Rush is a 2d shooter made with Unity. 

The game has been completely reskinned and all levels have been modified from what was taught in the tutorial. I have added an exit path for level 1 after defeating enemies, and given an option to continue playing incase they want to go for highscore. Level 2 has been made into a fortress level of eliminating all enemies. Level 3  is endless mode to compete for high score. A story has been added to give sense to the levels.
